{"id":526466075,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1626944534,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/526466075/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if(x==0) return 0.0;\n        if(n==0) return 1.0;\n        double res=1;\n        if(n>0){\n            while(n>0){\n                if(n%2)res*=x;\n                n/=2;\n                x*=x;\n            }\n        }else{\n            n=abs(n);\n            while(n>0){\n                if(n%2)res/=x;\n                n/=2;\n                x*=x;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
